The film's eventual worldwide gross was ₹221.48 crore, as reported by various sources.
The first schedule of the movie wrapped on February 11, 2018, in Mumbai.
The second schedule of the movie began on February 16, 2018, in Delhi.
The movie earned ₹7.35 crore at the box office on its first day of release.

node_2: indian box office collection by week 7
edge: The movie had collected ₹135.95 crore at the Indian Box Office by the seventh week of its release.
The movie is set to be remade in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada and Malayalam by Boney Kapoor.
The movie is set to be remade in Indonesian under the title Keluarga Slamet.
In March 2020, Junglee Pictures announced that Rajkummar Rao and Bhumi Pednekar will star in the official spiritual sequel of Badhaai Ho, titled Badhaai Do.
The principal photography for Badhaai Do commenced on January 5, 2021, in Dehradun.
The songs of the movie are composed by Tanishk Bagchi, Rochak Kohli, JAM8 and Sunny Bawra-Inder Bawra.
The lyrics of the songs are written by Vayu, Kumaar and MellowD.
